title: Can You Feel Me?
description: Lark kneels in the dungeon, blindfolded and waiting for his beloved Master Cian. Master Cian is treating him to a special session of sensation play. Buzzing with anticipation, Lark is already imagining his Master’s low, raspy voice, commanding all his senses as he asks, “Can you feel me?”Author’s Note: Can You Feel Me? is a gay erotica BDSM short with a twist.
author: Joey Nichols
